page.title: 18MY HOUSE 2
page.content:
My house is special to me because it has a small but beautiful garden. I have my own little stone pot of sweet peas and they are just about to flower. I also have a little stone hedgehog beside my sweet peas. My brother has a little pond for his tadpoles. It has a stone frog on a stand and our cat, Magnus, drinks all the water. We also have a proper pond. Our garden slopes. We have a frog that squirts water from its mouth and he is standing under a bridge which is also made of stone. Then we have a stone cat. It is sitting by the pond looking as if it is about to have a drink. I love my garden and I don't want it to change. My house is not as nice as the garden but I don't really mind as I can live in it in comfort.
E. Baker.
